column5: Makes me damn proud to be part of this amazing nation.
Ditto.   That was an incredible 2 weeks and in incredible hockey game to finish it off.    I am going to go slug back a pint of 100% maple syrup and mate with my wife.
Well we don`t own the whole podium but we own the best part, the golden part.
Correct me if I am wrong, most gold medals won by a hosting country in the winter olympics, not most gold won by a nation at a winter olympics.
Well don't that beat all! My Team Canada jersey and hat both got a little tighter! Way to go Canada.
